attributes.action: recognise that people without Degrees can make excellent teachers and role models for the real world
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As a holder of an HNC in Engineering with Industry experience I am not eligible to become a teacher as I am not classed as being qualified enough. I believe that people with a good level of education combined with industry experience would make good teachers and role models from the real world. Rather than teachers whose only life experience is university. Degrees are not the only answer.
